name: Wrestling Rumble: PRO Fighting
description:
Are you ready to knock down some heavyweight wee wrestling stars? This game will give you a once-in-a-lifetime chance to stand against the powerful players and beat ‘em up to show them who is a real PRO.




Play like the star that you are, to win and unlock more levels. Use your expert kickboxing moves against your rivals. Do not give them a chance to strike you, hit them first and hard to knockout. Knock ‘em off their feet and use all your manpower to keep them down. It is like a fighting club that will help you practice your wrestler’s skills. Show your opponents your karate kicks and strategize your duel well to master the art of martial arts and win.




The game offers a 1v1 knockout duel. Hero is the one who beats the other first, so engage yourself in this ultimate clash fight. This is not like any other fighting game that you have played before. The game can be played using multiple fighting styles like Muay Thai, Kung Fu, karate, kick, boxing, punch, taekwondo, tag team wrestling fight, martial arts, and much more. Rumble your way to the victory.




Pick a player of your choice. Unlock new players for the duel fight by using coins. Coins can be earned through collecting daily rewards or fighting your way through knocking out your rivals completely and win the wrestling match. Personalize your wrestling 1v1 fight experience by selecting a choice of player and setting up a name. The next levels can be unlocked by winning the current ring round.



Do not miss out on this extreme action-packed 3D fighting game. Be a wrestling star by defeating all the enemies. This might be your chance to prove to your friends that you are powerful. Invite them over and compare your knockout stamina The entire rival gang is waiting for you to show up. Do not give them the satisfaction of the victory. Guide them to their loss.


Hang tight and stay strong on your ground. Fight the wrestling duel like a PRO. This game will help polish your rusty fighter moves. Kick start your day with a victory through this game. Use your favorite fighting style like Muay Thai, Karate, Kung FU, boxing, and multiple other forms. Use all your defense strategies with your liking of smack-down superstars and challenge your friends to beat your scores in the game. You have a chance to get hands-on experience by fighting with additional fighting legends and duel superstars to your team or fight as a boxing champion.




Aim for the prize that is the wrestling superstar title, to win the most awaited bonus rewards in the shape of coins with each win in a heavyweight match. Open yourself to the world of extreme action and dangerous fights. This 3D combat sports game involves hand grappling techniques. Real Wrestling puts the power in your hands, the intensity, and raw emotion of wrestlers at just a touch away from your hand. Jaw-dropping 3D high definition graphics with intuitive touch controls, and awesome game-play creates a unique fighting experience for novice and veteran fighting fans combined.


Wrestling Rumble: PRO Fighting Game Features:

-Realistic gameplay with amazing angle shots
-Choice of players to choose from to give a personalized experience
-Intuitive touch controls with Jaw-dropping HD graphics
-Awesome background music and attention-grabbing environment
- Realistic action moves along with fierce turns
-Option to give your player a name to customize
-Awesome shots of the wrestling ring to give a real flight experience
